sect2.title: Dependencies
sect2.para: Sysvinit-&sysvinit-depversion; needs the following to be installed:
sect2.literallayout:
sh from the bash package
as from the binutils package ld from the binutils package
chown from the fileutils package install from the fileutils package ln from the fileutils package mknod from the fileutils package rm from the fileutils package
cc from the gcc package
make from the make package
patch from the patch package
